reviews.review: Absolutely loved the game play and the Greek mythology references in the storyline were subtle yet intriguing.
Si no has jugado este Portal pero si el 2 te pierdes la mitad del mejor juego en este estilo!

Poor graphics and a very short story line. I would still recomend it to anyone who is up for the puzzles and great game play. If the game was longer and had better graphics it would easily be one of my favorites, but better graphics and story is why they invented Portal 2. All and All, a great game, go buy it. The Cake is a Lie!

Just Brilliant:
1. Sophisticated Mind blower game
2. Riddles and "puzzles" you have to solve with your mind
3. A little bit action
Gioco che mi è piaciuto molto molto, e ho vcercato di fare una spece di speed run ma in confronto a quelli di youtube non ho speranze xD
Amazing game. This will be a classic video for all time.

Of all the PC games I've played over the course of my life, very few have equaled the amazing story line and gameplay of Portal. Featuring a unique weapon, complex puzzles, and a smooth learning curve, almost anyone (even non-gamers) can become immersed in the world of Aperature Science. Along with the equally thrilling Portal 2, Valve has made a series more creative and fresh than any other in a very long time. Did I mention there's a catchy song at the end?

Update: Portal is still one of the greatest games of all time and the only one I paid the full price on Steam. Worth every dollar!

Great game! 8/10
Timeless classic!
Awesome

awesome game and glad my friends recommended it to me. Going to start playing the second one to.

The cake is a lie
Awesome!

Klasika, kterou by nikdo neměl minout. Portal prověří vaši prostorovou orientaci a logiku. Pomocí speciální pušky otvíráte na vhodných površích portály, jejichž vhodnout kombinací postupujete prostředím.
Hra se dá dohrát za cca 2 hodiny, ale rozhodně stojí za to!

Der erste Teil der Portal-Reihe.
Pros:
- sehr gute Gameplay Idee
- gute Programmierung von Schwerkraftseigenschaften dank der hauseigenen Engine
- verhältnissmäßig gute Grafik
- cool gemachte Story
Cons:
- relativ kurze Spieldauer (3 Std.)
Alles in allem ein cooles Spiel .

Portal, el antecesor del ya más que conocido Portal 2, cuenta con unos gráficos similares a Portal 2 y también usa DirectX 9, para resumir más diré que es la versión limitada en cuanto a carga de mapa de su segunda entrega. Tiene una historia buena y sostente que revela ciertos aspectos de Portal 2. 

E aquí mi puntuación:
Gráficos: 8/10
Jugabilidad: 10/10
Sonido y FX: 7/10 *
Duración: Infinita

Puntuación final: 8,3

*Sonido y FX: Nota relativamente buena dado que tiene un sonido muy limpio y pulido, pero bajo dado que le falta un sonido característico o banda sonora (la voz de GLaDos no es una banda sonora xD)
Brilliant Game, worth the money and great fun!
Is gud game.
I love the pysics and the stratagy gameplay 10/10
It´s an amazing action-puzzle game based in half-life trilogy that it´s very funny and addictive. The source graphics will satisfize you because they are awesome!

Que decir más que JUEGAZO.
Plataformas, puzzles, diversión y bunny jump. Creo que son motivos suficientes para comprarlo.
Es muy cortito. Pero, lo bueno y breve, dos veces bueno.

Şu an buna yazdığım incelemenin belki de hiç manası yok çünkü siz, bu yazıyı okuyan kişi "Portal" denen bu oyunu en az bir kere ve belki benim gibi 3-4 kere bitirmişsinizdir... Ancak eğer daha oynamamışsanız, biz bu oyunu boşuna bu kadar sevmiyoruz :)

Portal è un classico, quello che si dice un 'must have'.
Il gioco è breve nella sua durata, ma sa regalare momenti di gameplay intenso, sia a livello di 'enigmi' sia come atmosfera.
Отличные головоломки, хотя местами слишком легко.

I did not think i would of liked this game when i looked at the clips. Its one of them games u have to risk and try.
Its got to be one of the best games iv ever played, the only bad point about this game is it dident last long enough..
Thank god portal 2 came out when it did, i couldent wait any longer..
어지러워도 정말 해볼만 하다. 재밌다.
Still my favorite game since it came out. even though i know exactly how to solve each level already, i still play it all the time.
Uno de los mejores juegos de plataformas. Original y muy entretenido. La única pega es que se hace corto. Totalmente recomendable.

This Game is fun, i've beaten it multiple times. The Game is kind of short. After the first few times it's easy, but still fun.
Recommend to all to play, for cake and party.

This is one of the most fun and addicting games I've played yet. The puzzles are easy and sometimes difficult. And I do suffer lag sometimes but still, this game is a most buy! I bought it with the Organge Box, but still it's a must buy! 10/10
One of the best games I have ever played. The environment and game play create an amazing experiance
Probably one of my favourite games of all time

A highly recommended game (make sure you play it before Portal 2).
If you want something amazing on steam, then I highly recommend this game. Besides the main game, portal has Advanced levels and challange maps. The game being so short gives you a very high replay value. This game is set in the Half-Life universe and is a puzzle game, using portals.
The game starts out with tutorial levels, basic instructure. Level 13-18 are the real challanges, after that you're given challanges outside that of the testing chambers, all leading up to a rememberable boss fight with GLaDOS
You must get this game if you do not have it already, its an amazing game.

Do you like challenging puzzles? Do you like exercising your mind in a new inventive way? Do you like subtle humor? Do you like Silly songs? Do you like increasingly homicidal robots that force you to murder your only friend and then try to kill you? If you said yes to all these questions then you have some pretty strange tastes, but you are in luck! Because this game is just what you are looking for.
Buen juego la verdad, se me ha hecho un poco corto, pero ha valido la pena, muy recomendable a aquellos que les gusten los puzles.
Could not have asked for a more creative and thoughtful puzzle game.
One of the most delightful game experiences I ever had... until I played Portal 2, which only served to further my love for the title even more.

Es hat schon viel spaß gemacht, allerdings war es zu schnell zu ende. Ich hatte es an einem Tag duch und das war ziemlich schade.
Portal2 hat eine wesendlich ländere dauer und es geht nicht nur  um Kuchen xD 

Also ich würde sagen, kauft euch lieber Portal2. das hat auch nen Coop ;)
Awesome game. Shame it wasn't longer t.t best end tune ever :D
This was the first game that got me really scared. What can I say? This game is genious!

I was a little late to the party with this game, but it still holds up very well in terms of gameplay & humour. It is one of the very few games I've ever played that actually is as good as the hype, and will be remembered for decades as a classic. If you still haven't bought it, do so. You will not regret it.
Much shorter campaign than I expected but very fun to play.

It's a short game but it is definitely one to replay many times. The gameplay is fun and if you like puzzles then this is your game. on top of a great puzzle solving experience this game is humorous and witty. You've heard it a million times by now but this is a great game. pick it up!
Mental fps puzzle! Portal 2 is even better.
Grandioso juego de puzzbles  donde  la  imaginacion es tan espectacular  como  el  desarrolo de la  misma
Very ood game :D

My first valve game. I enjoyed the demo, and loved the game. One of my all time favorites. It's basically just platforming and puzzles, but the physics engine makes it a game that it's all about fun, not cutscenes.

Ya considerado todo un clásico, esta obra no puede faltar en tu biblioteca de Steam. Un claro ejemplo de como los videojuegos, son capaces de llegar al corazón del jugador, transmitir sensaciones muy profundas y, convertirse en arte.
Recomendado especialmente si eres nuevo y quieres descubrir un juego, que por su trama, personajes, y mecánicas; ha marcado para siempre la industria.

Portal é extremamente viciante por fugir completamente do senso comum de jogos em primeira pessoa e forçar o jogador a pensar completamente diferente de qualquer jogo que já tenha jogado. 

A história é contada de forma sutil e contribui e muito para que o jogo vá se tornando cada vez mais interessante e envolvente.

Recomendo!
Leuk spel, zeker een aanrader
Think with portals, maaan.
One of the best games i have ever seen. This game combines a ordinary gameplay with a sweet and compact story.
Never played this before buying in the summer sale. It's simply brilliant - a bit short but that shouldn't stop you spending a few quid on it, well worth the money. Fantastic game.

ハーフライフのスピンオフ作品らしいのですが、今までのFPSっぽい要素は1つもなく、3Dゲームでパズルを解くという新しい方法で売り出した作品だそうです。
今やPortal2が出るほどの人気です！
物理エンジンをフルに使用したパズル、あなたには解けますか？
I was promised cake.

There are a few games on this earth that I recomend to everyone.  This is one of those games.

This is the kind of game that makes you really appreaciate that video games are a major type of media.  Maybe you think that The Lord of the Rings is a perfect book, or that Citizen Kane is a perfect movie; when it comes to video games this is a legend that I can only compare to other perfect games.  

At times you might get frustrated if you get stuck, but the reward of the voice acting, visuals (especially in Portal 2), and funny moments are more than worth the $10 (or less thanks to steam sales) that you would spend on this AAA game.  I'm proud to have speant money on this to show other game makers that this is the kind of game I want more of.

Portal is a super fun, whitty, puzzle game where you hate your real life cause damnit why don't portal guns actually exist!! AAAAAGGGHHH..... I give Portal an 8 outta 10. the puzzles are fun and each one requires new thinking but it is a little short, especially if you happen to be pretty good at portal games, there are loads of secrets, a level of exploration that was vaguely more than i was expecting and fun after game content.
This game is awesome. Cant go wrong with cake.
One of the best games of all time

传送门1绝对的经典之作，虽然这个游戏初看起来不怎么起眼，但是当你细细品味之后，一种欣喜的感觉油然而生。
就像是大餐之后的一道甜点，甜而不腻。在大作频发的今天，这种游戏绝对会给你一种惊喜。
至少我个人很满足（笑）。
sweet lord jesus this is an amazing game.
Very entertaining game, definitely worth buying.

Portal, it's delicious.
Fantastically ahead of its time. First game to ever actually make me think.

If you're into puzzle games, this is for you. It has a near-perfect balance of difficulty and challenge, and that's what really matters in a game. The OST while quiet, is very relaxing, GlaDos adds some personality to the game, and overall Portal is a solid game that I'd recommend.

I love this game it is so fun. I am a console gamer slowly tranforming into a pc gamer and this game is perfect 9.5/1o 
MUST BUY FOR PC

Este jogo é excelente. Um quebra-cabeça que mata um tempinho da sua vida, porque quando você começa é dificil querer parar. Pena que ele é curto, com umas 3 horas +/- você já termina a "campanha". E de quebra ganha um belo BOLO!!!  (y)

Amazing, It Really Changed The Puzzle Genre and is Amazing!
Un jeu à part entière, un peu court certes, mais parfaitement structuré. Une mise en bouche phénoménale pour le deuxième épisode.

Enter a world of mystery surrounding you, Chell, a test subject in aperture labratories. You find yourself trapped, but then, a voice comes on the speaker and say "Hello, and welcome to the Aperture Science computer aided enrichment center" and your journey begins. Wresting control of the A.S.P.D or the Portal Gun, you find a way through the puzzles presented to you and find your way through the maze for your cake. But that is only the begining.
I think there is a hole in my head..
Игра проходится на одном дыхании! Очень интересная! Игра которая предлагает подумать, а не просто бежать вперед. Всем советую!

Poczatek taki sredni bez zadnego portala ale gdy na koncu GlaDoS probowala mnie zabic to dowiedzialem ze musze uzyc moich zdolnosci gdy na koncu okazalo sie ze ona nie chciala mnie zabic bo mnie nienawidzila po prostu lubila mnie gdy napisy koncowe pokazaly mi sie po 5 godzinach to prawie sie rozplakalem napisala mi GlaDoS ze lubila mnie i ze cieszyla sie moim szczesciem jak ją palilem rozsadzalem i ropzpruwalem wedlug mnie gra caly czas trzyma nerwy a potem je rozluźnia Koniec 10/10

Très bon jeu, court mais ce n'est que le premier.
Les énigmes sont intéressantes, peut-être assez facile au début mais après ça se corse un peu plus.
Notons également un scenario pas si mal, qui n'est malheureusement pas hyper développé (dans le premier) mais avec un univers bien à soi et très intriguant.
Je conseille fortement ce jeu!
